text.text_translated:
Pi and Richard Parker stayed in a lifeboat for 227 days.  
They were very hungry, often weak, got sick and felt very tired.  
They went through violent storms and the hot Pacific sun.  
Their religions gave them comfort, but they also felt lonely and sad.  
It was very difficult, but they stayed alive.  
Finally the Mexican coast appeared.  
Everything changed.  
I will not tell the ending.  
You must read the book.  
It tells what happens when they see land.
